alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Sanilac; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 2:50PM EDT until July 20 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Tuscola County in southeastern Michigan... Sanilac County in southeastern Michigan... Northeastern Lapeer County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 249 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clifford, or near Marlette, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Brown City around 255 PM EDT. Sandusky and Peck around 315 PM EDT. Croswell around 325 PM EDT. Carsonville and Applegate around 330 PM EDT. Port Sanilac around 340 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include East Dayton, Birch Beach, McGregor, Wilmot, Amador, Snover, Juhl, Elmer, Silverwood and Valley Center. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
